com.adobe.exm.expeval

Interface EXPEvaluator


  • public interface EXPEvaluator
    Provides APIs for evaluating and validating expressions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateExpressions

        HashMap<String,Serializable> evaluateExpressions(HashMap<String,String> expressions,
                                                 Serializable inputData)
                                          throws EXPException
        Evaluates a set of expressions in a batch. The API accepts a collection of expressions and input data required to evaluate these expressions and returns a collection of expression results. The input expressions are provided as a map where each expression is mapped against a unique key. The result of API returns a map containing result of the expression mapped to the key of corresponding expression.
        Parameters:
        expressions - Map of expression keys and expressions.
        inputData - input data based on which expressions will be evaluated.
        Returns:
        map of expression keys and the computed values.
        Throws:
        EXPException

      • validateExpression

        void validateExpression(String expression)
                 throws EXPException
        Validates an expression. Throws exception if syntax of expression is incorrect.
        Parameters:
        expression - expression required to be validated.
        Throws:
        EXPException

      • evaluateExpression

        Serializable evaluateExpression(String expression,
                                Serializable inputData)
                         throws EXPException
        Evaluates a single expression. The API expects an expression and the input data required to evaluate this expression and returns the computed value of expression.
        Parameters:
        expression - expression required to be evaluated.
        inputData - input data based on which expression will be evaluated.
        Returns:
        evaluated value of the expression.
        Throws:
        EXPException

      • evaluateExpression

        Serializable evaluateExpression(String expression,
                                Serializable inputData,
                                String outputVariable)
                         throws EXPException
        Evaluates a single expression. The API expects an expression and the input data required to evaluate this expression and returns the computed value of expression.
        Parameters:
        expression - expression required to be evaluated.
        inputData - input data based on which expression will be evaluated.
        outputVariable - determine whether splitting is required or not based on outputVariable type
        Returns:
        evaluated value of the expression.
        Throws:
        EXPException

      • getExpressionVariables

        List<String> getExpressionVariables(String expression)
                             throws EXPException
        Parses the expression and returns the input variables used inside this expression.
        Parameters:
        expression - expression required to be parsed.
        Returns:
        variables used inside the expression.
        Throws:
        EXPException

        com.adobe.exm.expeval.EXPVariableResolver createVariableResolver()
